Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
42151 Indices of new orders in manufacturing
44111 Monthly report on the main construction industry


42151 Indices of new orders in manufacturing
======================================

Definition:
The index calculation is based on the total of the values of
the orders definitely accepted in the reference month. This
total of values is related to the relevant monthly average
in the base year and forms the value index for an economic
branch.
The individual indices for economic branches are aggregated
to form indices for "manufacturing" and for its main
industrial groupings. This is done by means of the
proportions of the values of new orders in the base year.


44111 Monthly report on the main construction industry
================================================

Definition:
The value index is a measure of the nominal development of
new orders in the main construction industry.
New orders are defined as the total value of all
construction contracts received during the reference period
and definitely accepted by the establishment.
